dict.acceptation: 羔羊，小羊；羔羊肉；<宗>耶稣；

sent.orig: The Rankine and Lamb vortex corc models are mixed,and the secondary dis-crete vortices are taken.
sent.trans: 试用了混合的Rankine和Lamb涡模型及二次离散涡。

sent.orig: Deep-Fried Breaded Lamb Rack, Braised Lamb Shank & Roasted Lamb Tenderloin.
sent.trans: 酥炸羊排，慢炖羊腱，烤羊柳。

sent.orig: A lamb which likes eating bones get the name of "the oddest lamb ever"
sent.trans: 一只喜欢吃骨头的小羊被誉为“史上最牛的羊”

sent.orig: Do you also want a leg of lamb or lamb chops?
sent.trans: 你还要买羊腿或羊排吗？

sent.orig: Main food include including roast lamb, lamb satay.
sent.trans: 主要供应食品，包括烤羊肉，羊肉沙爹。
